title: 416: She’s Not Supportive of My Relationship + He Won’t Go Down!
itunes:title: 416: She’s Not Supportive of My Relationship + He Won’t Go Down!
description:
The Broads catch up, chat about recent crying habits, and then answer the #broadsquad’s questions about bumping into the potential love of your life, feeling like a best friend isn’t supportive about a serious relationship, pursuing your dream career, and a partner who won’t go down! 

*Make sure to tune in next Thursday when The Broad’s drop their first Bachelorette recap of the season! 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FAVOR: Favor is offering a donation to BEDSIDER.ORG for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a member when you go to HEYFAVOR.COM/CHATTY 

***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY135 and use code CHATTY135 to get $135 off across 5 boxes plus free shipping on your first box! 

***SEED: Visit SEED.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed’s DS-01 Daily Synbiotic!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
